seo.defaultDescription: AI-powered price comparison and route optimization for your grocery shopping. Save time and money every day.

home.title: Shop <1>smarter</1>, not harder
home.subtitle: Tell us what you need. Our AI scans every store nearby and finds where to shop for the least.
home.placeholder: e.g. milk, eggs, chicken for dinner tonight...

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: SmartHandel makes it easy to save money on your daily shopping.

step1.title: 1. Write what you need
step1.description: Tell us what you want, just like you would tell a friend.

step2.title: 2. We find the best prices
step2.description: Our AI checks prices in all stores near you instantly.

step3.title: 3. Save money
step3.description: Choose the cheapest store or the smartest route to save the most.

tips.title: Shopping Tips
tips.tip1: Check store apps for extra member deals.
tips.tip3: Best time to shop is usually Tuesday mornings.

home.location_error: We need your location to find stores near you.
home.geolocation_not_supported: Your browser does not support geolocation.
home.allow_location_alert: Please allow location access to search.
search_placeholders: 2 liters of milk, eggs, cheese for under 200kr
Healthy breakfast for the whole week

itemCard.flexible_desc: Always optimizes for best regional price

thinking.ai_working: SmartHandel AI is working for you

about.heroDescription: SmartHandel is your personal shopping assistant that uses artificial intelligence to find the cheapest items and the smartest route choices available in your neighborhood.
about.missionDescription1: We believe that grocery pricing should be transparent and accessible to everyone. Our platform was born out of the frustration of seeing the same basket of goods cost significantly more depending on where you shop.
about.missionDescription2: By leveraging real-time data and advanced route optimization, we empower shoppers to make informed decisions that save them thousands of kroner every year without sacrificing quality or convenience.
about.threeSimpleSteps: Save money in three simple steps
about.step1Desc: Use natural language to tell us what you need. Our AI understands everything from specific brands to general dinner ideas.
about.step2Desc: We scan every major grocery chain near your current location to find the exact prices and availability for your items.
about.step3Desc: Pick the most convenient single store or follow our 'Smart Route' to split your list across stores for maximum savings.
about.faqQ1: Is it completely free to use?
about.faqA1: Yes! SmartHandel is 100% free for consumers. We want to make price comparison accessible to every household in Norway.
about.faqQ2: How accurate are the prices shown?
about.faqA2: We fetch data in real-time from store systems. While we aim for 100% accuracy, prices can occasionally change in-store or vary by location.
about.faqA3: We support all major Norwegian chains including REMA 1000, Kiwi, Coop, Meny, and more. If a store is near you, we likely compare it.
about.faqA4: Absolutely. We only use your location to find nearby stores. We do not store your precise movement history or sell your data to third parties.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: SmartHandel is built by a dedicated team of engineers and data scientists in Oslo who believe technology can make everyday life significantly more affordable.

storeCard.noItemsFound: No items found in this store

errors.generic_message: Sorry, we encountered a problem. Please try again.
errors.network_message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.timeout_message: The request took too long. The server might be busy.
errors.validation_message: We couldn't understand the request. Please check your input.
errors.searchFailed: Search failed. We couldn't process your request.
errors.locationsDisabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable them to find nearby stores.

layout.tagline: Your smart shopping assistant that finds the best prices and saves you time and money.
